smartphones.title: Samsung S24 Ultra 5G
smartphones.description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra 5G is a powerhouse flagship smartphone designed to deliver top-tier performance, exceptional camera capabilities, and cutting-edge AI-driven features. With its sleek Titanium Black finish, this premium device exudes elegance while ensuring durability.

smartphones.title: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max
highlights: 17.02 cm (6.7 inch) Super Retina XDR Display
A16 Bionic Chip, 6 Core Processor Processor
smartphones.description: The Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max is a premium flagship smartphone that blends cutting-edge technology with an elegant Deep Purple finish. Featuring a powerful A16 Bionic chip, an advanced ProMotion display, and a revolutionary 48MP Pro Camera System, this device sets new standards in performance and photography.

smartphones.title: Realme 12X 5G
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 128 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 2 TB
smartphones.description: The Realme 12x 5G is a sleek powerhouse redefining mobile technology. Swift charging meets endurance with 45 W SUPERVOOC Charge and a 5000 mAh battery, ensuring you're always connected. The Dimensity 6100+ 6nm chipset delivers lightning-fast 5G speeds for seamless connectivity wherever you are. Immerse yourself in the 12.07 cm (6.72) 120 Hz FHD+ Display, offering crystal-clear visuals with its ultra-smooth refresh rate. Style meets substance with its ultra-slim 7.69 mm profile and lightweight 188g body. Capture life's moments in stunning detail with the 50 MP AI camera, while the vapour chamber cooling system keeps performance optimal. Elevate your audio experience with dual stereo speakers, delivering Hi-Res Audio certification for immersive sound.

smartphones.title: vivo V40 5G
smartphones.description: The vivo V40 5G is a premium smartphone that combines powerful performance with elegant design. Featuring a Lotus Purple finish, this device offers ample storage, a high-refresh-rate display, and advanced camera capabilities.

smartphones.title: REDMI Note 13 5G
highlights: 8 GB RAM | 256 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB
smartphones.description: Discover the Redmi Note 13 5G, a smartphone that raises the bar on performance. Enjoy a visual feast with its breathtaking 16.94 cm AMOLED display and slim bezel. Take pleasure in fluid interactions on the incredibly smooth 120 Hz screen, which is complemented by the slimmest Redmi Note to date with a 7.6 mm profile. Durability is guaranteed with Corning Gorilla Glass 5, which is enhanced with an IP54 grade for further security. With the 108 MP triple camera configuration, you can capture every moment. The MediaTek Dimensity 6080 CPU powers lightning-fast 5G performance. Stays charged all day with a 5000 mAh battery and 33 W quick charging. Experience mobile at its finest with the Redmi Note 13 5G, where innovation and quality collide.

smartphones.title: OPPO K12x 5G
highlights: 6 GB RAM | 64 GB ROM | Expandable Upto 1 TB
16.94 cm (6.67 inch) Full HD+ Super AMOLED Display
smartphones.description: Oppo K12x 5G is a Sleek, aesthetic and light, this is the ultimate stylish device that will turn heads wherever you go. Classy, cool and bright vibes, this phone packs a big battery in a slim 7.68 mm casing. - Weight about 186 g.

airpods.title: Apple AirPods Pro
highlights: Apple-designed H2 chip, the force behind AirPods Pro, pushes advanced audio performance even further
Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation than the previous-generation AirPods Pro, so you,ll hear dramatically less noise from your surrounding
Personalised Volume and personalised spatial audio
airpods.description: The Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max is a premium flagship smartphone that blends cutting-edge technology with an elegant Deep Purple finish. Featuring a powerful A16 Bionic chip, an advanced ProMotion display, and a revolutionary 48MP Pro Camera System, this device sets new standards in performance and photography.

airpods.title: Noise Air Buds Pro SE
highlights: Wireless range: 10 m with ENC with Quad Mic
airpods.description: Presenting Buds VS102 Elite. It comes with a premium chrome finish and is feature-packed with 50 hours of playtime. It upholds every rhythm, keeps you connected to your music, and calls for a long time. With quad mics featuring ENC, experience the flow of smooth conversations and a clear voice even in a chaotic environment. Immerse yourself in a world where you hear every beat in all its glory with the mastery of an 11mm driver. Within just 10 minutes of charging, enjoy the revival for a good 120 minutes. Laden with rich features like BT v5.3, IPX5 water resistance, and type-C charging, get ready to take your music with you.
